    1.00 05 Oct 2018

      Method which builds the appropriate Streams if in- and output files are given as attributes.
      (package private) static void evaluate​(java.lang.String[] args)
      checks which input and output possibility is chosen by the user by evaluating the amount of given arguments.
      (package private) static void grep​(java.lang.String regex, java.io.Reader reader, java.io.Writer writer)
      The method which searchs the input stream for the searched regex and writes the appropriate files to the output stream.

      • grep

        static void grep​(java.lang.String regex,
                 java.io.Reader reader,
                 java.io.Writer writer)
          throws java.io.IOException
        The method which searchs the input stream for the searched regex and writes the appropriate files to the output stream.
        Parameters:
        regex - - expression to be searched
        reader - - reader for chosen input
        writer - - writer for chosen output
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - - Exception if something goes wrong while file handling
